DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether we can establish different markers suc as mean arterial pressure , flow in the uterine arteries, biochemical markers in maternal blood and more un the first trimester, in order to screen for twin pregnancies that are more likely to develop adverse pregnancy outcome: early delivery, pre eclampsia or small fetuses.
DOC.brief_title: Establishing First Trimester Markers for the Identification of High Risk Twin
DOC.criteria: pregnant women from 11 14 weeks of gestation nuchal thickness above 3 mm, Chronic hypertension, thrombophilia, Diabetes
